data.name: CommonSettings_Language_Description
data.value: Select the display language for the software.

data.name: CommonSettings_Theme_Description
data.value: Select the display theme for the software.

data.name: ProxySettings_IsEnabled_Description
data.value: Override the system proxy with an application-specific proxy.

data.name: ProxySettings_Endpoint_Description
data.value: Enter the proxy URI, for example http://127.0.0.1:7890.

data.name: ProxySettings_BypassOnLocal_Description
data.value: Send requests to intranet and loopback addresses directly.

data.name: ProxySettings_BypassList_Description
data.value: Optional. One pattern per line; matching hosts bypass the proxy.

data.name: ProxySettings_UseAuthentication_Description
data.value: Enable credentials when the proxy requires authentication.

data.name: ProxySettings_Username_Description
data.value: User name for the proxy server.

data.name: ChatWindowSettings_Shortcut_Description
data.value: Set a shortcut to invoke the chat window at any time.

data.name: CustomAssistant_Temperature_Description
data.value: Higher values yield more imaginative, creative responses; lower values produce more precise, conservative outputs; note that temperatures above 1.0 may cause garbled output in some models.

data.name: CustomAssistant_TopP_Description
data.value: Higher values allow a wider range of possible responses; lower values favor the most probable answers; it‚Äôs not recommended to modify this alongside the temperature. This setting is only effective for some models. If you encounter an error, try restoring the default value.

data.name: WebSearchEngineProvider_Description
data.value: Select the service provider for web search engines.

data.name: WebSearchEngineProvider_EndPoint_Description
data.value: Leaving this to default if you don't know what to do. Must starts with "http(s)://".

data.name: ChatInputArea_ImageButton_ToolTip
data.value: Allow access to aware your screen

data.name: ChatInputArea_ToolCallButton_ToolTip
data.value: Use tools to enhance assistant capabilities (Ctrl+T)

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_BadRequest
data.value: Bad request, possibly due to an incorrect API key or unsupported network/region.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_Unauthorized
data.value: Unauthorized request, possibly due to an incorrect API key or unsupported network/region.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_Forbidden
data.value: Request forbidden, possibly due to an incorrect API key or unsupported network/region.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_InternalServerError
data.value: Server encountered an error, please try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_ServiceUnavailable
data.value: Server unavailable, please try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_GatewayTimeout
data.value: Gateway connection timed out, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_RequestTimeout
data.value: Request connection timed out, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_BadGateway
data.value: Gateway connection error, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_HttpRequest_0
data.value: Unknown error, please try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_HostNotFound
data.value: Hostname could not be resolved, please check your DNS settings or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_ConnectionRefused
data.value: Connection refused, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_ConnectionReset
data.value: Connection reset, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_ConnectionAborted
data.value: Connection aborted, please check your network or try again later.

data.name: FriendlyExceptionMessage_Socket_0
data.value: Unknown error, please try again later.

data.name: AboutPage_Description
data.value: Perceives your screen content in real-time, breaking down application barriers to provide intelligent assistance that truly fits the current context, transforming your desktop into a seamless, intelligent workspace.

data.name: App_EverywhereIsAlreadyRunning
data.value: Everywhere is already running, please check Tray Icon.

data.name: WelcomeView_IntroStep_Message2
data.value: Nice to meet you! Let me be your assistant and help you solve problems!

data.name: ChatWindowSettings_WindowPinMode_Description
data.value: Specifies the pin mode for the chat window when it is opened. When the window is not fixed, it will be hidden automatically when it loses focus.

data.name: ChatWindowSettings_VisualTreeDetailLevel_Description
data.value: Choose how much information is captured from the UI tree when attaching elements.

data.name: CustomAssistant_PresencePenalty_Description
data.value: The higher the value, the more inclined to use different expressions and avoid concept repetition; the lower the value, the more inclined to use repeated concepts or narratives, resulting in more consistent expression. This setting is only effective for some models. If you encounter an error, try restoring the default value.

data.name: CustomAssistant_FrequencyPenalty_Description
data.value: The higher the value, the more diverse and rich the vocabulary; the lower the value, the simpler and more straightforward the language. This setting is only effective for some models. If you encounter an error, try restoring the default value.

data.name: CustomAssistant_Endpoint_Description
data.value: Must start with http:// or https://.

data.name: CustomAssistant_ApiKey_Description
data.value: For online models, you need to get from the corresponding official, please refer to the guide for details.

data.name: CustomAssistant_IsImageInputSupported_Description
data.value: The model supports image input. Enabling this option may cause errors during conversation if the model does not support it.

data.name: CustomAssistant_IsFunctionCallingSupported_Description
data.value: The model supports using configured tools. Enabling this option may cause errors during conversation if the model does not support it.

data.name: CustomAssistant_IsDeepThinkingSupported_Description
data.value: The model supports thinking before answering. Enabling this option may cause errors during conversation if the model does not support it.

data.name: CustomAssistant_MaxTokens_Description
data.value: The maximum context length for the conversation. This will affect the strategy for building the visual tree, so please set it to a realistic value.

data.name: CustomAssistant_Schema_Description
data.value: Select the API protocol. Note that this is not always associated with the model; for example, Gemini provides an OpenAI-compatible protocol, please refer to the official usage instructions for the corresponding model.

data.name: CommonSettings_IsStartupEnabled_Description
data.value: Everywhere will run automatically after startup. If ‚ÄúStartup as Administrator‚Äù is enabled, the current option can only be disabled in administrator mode.

data.name: CommonSettings_IsAdministratorStartupEnabled_Description
data.value: Everywhere will start automatically as administrator. You can only turn this option on or off in administrator mode.

data.name: CommonSettings_RestartAsAdministrator_Description
data.value: Due to operating system restrictions, when running any application as an administrator (elevated permissions), Everywhere may not work correctly when the elevated applications are in focus or trying to interact with a Everywhere feature like "Pick Element". This can be addressed by running Everywhere as administrator.

data.name: CommonSettings_DebugFeatures_Description
data.value: Access and manage application settings file and logs.

data.name: CommonSettings_SoftwareUpdate_Description
data.value: If an update is available, click Update and Everywhere will automatically download and install the latest version. You may need to select ‚ÄúYes‚Äù in the pop-up window during the process.

data.name: CommonSettings_IsAutomaticUpdateCheckEnabled_Description
data.value: If enabled, Everywhere will periodically check for updates (only when Everywhere is running, without adding extra load to the system).

data.name: CustomAssistant_ModelId_Description
data.value: The model identifier for API calls, such as gpt-4o.

data.name: ChatPluginPage_Description
data.value: Chat plugins include built-in plugins and MCP plugins. LLMs that support tool calls will use these plugins at appropriate times (such as searching the web or accessing local files) to gain more powerful functionality.

data.name: WebSearchEngineProvider_ApiKey_Description
data.value: You need to get from the corresponding official, please refer to the guide for details.

data.name: WebSearchEngineProvider_SearchEngineId_Description
data.value: (Google only) Provides a programmable search engine ID. For details, refer to the guide.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_Description
data.value: Providing web browsing capabilities, including search engine and webpage access functions, can reduce model hallucinations and deliver up-to-date information. Note: Using the "Web Search" tool requires configuring a search engine API key (different from the model API key). If you do not intend to configure an API key, you may uncheck the "Web Search" tool and use only the "Web Browser" tool.

data.name: Windows_BuiltInChatPlugin_PowerShell_Description
data.value: Provides the ability to execute PowerShell scripts, allowing direct interaction with the system. However, it is also dangerous and may result in accidental file deletion or system crashes.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_Description
data.value: Provides the ability to access files, such as enumerating, creating, deleting, renaming, reading, or writing.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_VisualTree_Description
data.value: Provide the ability to perceive and manipulate UI elements on the screen.

data.name: ChangeLogView_Header
data.value: Everywhere has been updated to the latest version üéâ

data.name: ChangeLogView_Content
data.value: I'm still very young, so if you have any problems, feel free to click the link below for feedback, I'll keep on evolving! You're also welcome to click the link below to enter the group discussion, more social media is under construction, so stay tuned. Tip: You can reopen this message by clicking ‚ÄúAbout - What's new‚Äù.

data.name: WelcomeView_ConfiguratorStep_Message1
data.value: Let's start with the first step: choose a 'brain' for me! My intelligence is powered by large language models, and I need your help to configure it. I have provided several configuration modes for you to choose from, just select the one that suits you best.

data.name: WelcomeView_ConfiguratorStep_Message2
data.value: Don't worry, if it doesn't fit, you can always go back and choose again.

data.name: WelcomeView_AssistantStep_PresetBased_Message1
data.value: Welcome to the preset mode. Just select the large model provider you want to use, then obtain the API key and fill it in, and finally choose the model to get started!

data.name: WelcomeView_AssistantStep_PresetBased_Message2
data.value: Don't worry, your key will be stored encrypted, I cannot read it.

data.name: WelcomeView_IntroStep_Message6
data.value: Tip: You can click ‚ÄúAbout - Welcome Page‚Äù to reopen this message.

data.name: WelcomeView_IntroStep_Message3
data.value: You can wake me up anytime, everywhere. I can understand your current work context‚Äîwhether it's emails, articles, or web pages‚Äîand help you solve problems more intelligently!

data.name: WelcomeView_IntroStep_Message4
data.value: If this is your first time using it, I'll guide you through the initial setup in three simple steps.

data.name: WelcomeView_AssistantStep_PresetBased_Message3
data.value: If you don't know how to choose or obtain the API key, please refer to the tutorial here.

data.name: WelcomeView_AssistantStep_PresetBased_Message4
data.value: After completing your selection, please click 'Test assistant availability', and I will check if the configuration is correct.

data.name: WelcomeView_AssistantStep_PresetBased_Message5
data.value: üéâ Verify successful! Let's move on to the final step!

data.name: WelcomeView_ShortcutStep_Message1
data.value: Congratulations! Everything is complete. You can wake me up anytime using the shortcut key below.

data.name: WelcomeView_ShortcutStep_Message2
data.value: If there's no response, it might be occupied by other software. You can click to change the shortcut key.

data.name: WelcomeView_TelemetryStep_Message1
data.value: To help me grow, we invite you to join the user experience program. We will collect your usage data, which will only be used for analysis and does not contain or allow for any inference of personal data about you.

data.name: WelcomeView_TelemetryStep_Message2
data.value: If you do not join, only necessary data will be sent. Rest assured, this choice will not affect core functionality.

data.name: CommonSettings_DiagnosticData_Description
data.value: To help us improve, we invite you to join the user experience program. We will collect your usage data, which will only be used for analysis and does not contain or allow for any inference of personal data about you. If you do not join, only necessary data will be sent. This choice will not affect core functionality.

data.name: ChatWindowSettings_ShowChatStatistics_Description
data.value: When enabled, usage data will be displayed at the end of each conversation round within the chat window.

data.name: HandledChatException_InvalidConfiguration
data.value: Model configuration is incorrect, model provider or model ID is missing or invalid, or the current model does not support image input/tool calls.

data.name: HandledChatException_InvalidApiKey
data.value: API key is missing or invalid.

data.name: HandledChatException_QuotaExceeded
data.value: Exceeding API usage quotas, which typically indicates insufficient balance or lack of access permissions for the current model.

data.name: HandledChatException_RateLimit
data.value: Request too frequent, insufficient account balance, or network/region not supported.

data.name: HandledChatException_EndpointNotReachable
data.value: Service endpoint is not reachable. Please check your network connection.

data.name: HandledChatException_EmptyResponse
data.value: Service returned an empty response, which may indicate a network or service issue.

data.name: HandledChatException_FeatureNotSupport
data.value: Selected model does not support the requested feature.

data.name: HandledChatException_ImageNotSupport
data.value: Selected model does not support image input.

data.name: HandledChatException_Timeout
data.value: Request to the service timed out. Please try again.

data.name: HandledChatException_NetworkError
data.value: A network error has occurred. Please check your network or proxy settings, or your service provider may not support your region.

data.name: HandledChatException_ServiceUnavailable
data.value: Service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

data.name: ChatWindowSettings_AutomaticallyAddElement_Description
data.value: When enabled, automatically add focused element as attachment when opening chat window.

data.name: ChatWindowSettings_AllowRunInBackground_Description
data.value: When enabled, closing the chat window will not terminate the current task.

data.name: ChatPluginPage_SelectToViewDetails
data.value: Select an item on the left to view details

data.name: HandledChatException_ContextLengthExceeded
data.value: The context length exceeds the limit. Try creating a new chat or switching to a model with a longer context.

data.name: CustomAssistant_Name_Description
data.value: Specify the name of the assistant, used solely for display and differentiation purposes.

data.name: CustomAssistant_Description_Description
data.value: Specify the description of the assistant, used solely for display and differentiation purposes.

data.name: CustomAssistant_SystemPrompt_Description
data.value: The system prompt will be sent to the model at the beginning of the conversation and will be kept up to date with each message sent. Placeholders can be used in the prompt, enclosed in {}, which will be replaced with the corresponding content before being sent to the model.

data.name: CustomAssistantPageViewModel_DeleteCustomAssistant_Dialog_Message
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the "{0}"?

data.name: HandledSystemException_IOException
data.value: A general I/O error occurred. This might be due to a problem with reading or writing a file.

data.name: HandledSystemException_UnauthorizedAccess
data.value: Access to a required resource was denied. Please check file permissions or run the application as an administrator.

data.name: HandledSystemException_PathTooLong
data.value: Specified file or directory path is too long. Please try using a shorter path.

data.name: HandledSystemException_Timeout
data.value: Operation timed out. Please check your system performance and try again.

data.name: HandledSystemException_FileNotFound
data.value: Specified file not found. Please ensure the file exists and the path is correct.

data.name: HandledSystemException_DirectoryNotFound
data.value: Specified directory not found. Please ensure the directory exists and the path is correct.

data.name: HandledSystemException_NotSupported
data.value: Requested operation is not supported on your system.

data.name: HandledSystemException_Security
data.value: A security error occurred. The application may not have the necessary permissions.

data.name: HandledSystemException_COMException
data.value: System component (COM) error occurred. This may indicate an issue with the OS or a dependency.

data.name: HandledSystemException_Win32Exception
data.value: A Windows system error occurred. Please check the application logs for more details.

data.name: HandledSystemException_Socket
data.value: A network socket error occurred. Please check your network connection and firewall settings.

data.name: HandledSystemException_OutOfMemory
data.value: Application ran out of memory. Please close other programs and try again.

data.name: HandledSystemException_DriveNotFound
data.value: Specified drive not found. Please ensure the drive is connected and accessible.

data.name: HandledSystemException_EndOfStream
data.value: An unexpected end of a data stream was reached. This might indicate a corrupted file or network issue.

data.name: HandledSystemException_InvalidData
data.value: Data being processed is invalid or corrupted. Please check the source file or data.

data.name: HandledSystemException_Unknown
data.value: An unexpected system error occurred. Please try again or check the application logs.

data.name: HandledSystemException_InvalidOperation
data.value: Operation is invalid. Please ensure the configuration is correct.

data.name: HandledSystemException_InvalidArgument
data.value: Argument is invalid. Please ensure the configuration is correct.

data.name: HandledSystemException_InvalidFormat
data.value: Format is invalid. Please ensure the configuration is correct.

data.name: HandledSystemException_ArgumentNull
data.value: Argument is empty. Please ensure the configuration is correct.

data.name: HandledSystemException_ArgumentOutOfRange
data.value: Argument is out of valid range. Please ensure the configuration is correct.

data.name: HandledSystemException_SSLConnectionError
data.value: The SSL connection could not be established. Please check your network settings or certificate.

data.name: HandledSystemException_ConnectionRefused
data.value: The connection was refused by the server. Please check if the service is running and accessible.

data.name: HandledSystemException_HostNotFound
data.value: The host could not be found. Please check the address and your network connection.

data.name: Windows_BuiltInChatPlugin_Everything_Description
data.value: Use Everything (a high-performance local file search engine) to search for files on your computer.

data.name: CustomAssistantPage_CheckConnectivityButton_ToolTip
data.value: Confirm the availability of the model service

data.name: CustomAssistantPage_CreateNewCustomAssistantButton_ToolTip
data.value: Start a new configuration for an AI assistant.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_DeleteFiles_DeletionConsent_Header
data.value: {0} files or folders will be deleted

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_DeleteFiles_SystemFile_DeletionConsent_Header
data.value: System file or directory will be deleted

data.name: ChatWindowSettings_TemporaryChatMode_Description
data.value: Whether to use temporary chats when creating new chats.

data.name: Windows_BuiltInChatPlugin_PowerShell_ExecuteScript_ScriptConsent_Header
data.value: The following PowerShell script will be executed

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_SearchFiles_Description
data.value: Search for files or directories in a specified path matching the given pattern.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_GetFileInformation_Description
data.value: Get information about a file or directory at the specified path.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_SearchFileContent_Description
data.value: Search for a specific text within file(s) and return matching lines.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_ReadFile_Description
data.value: Read the content of a file at the specified path.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_MoveFile_Description
data.value: Move or rename a file or directory.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_DeleteFiles_Description
data.value: Delete files or directories at the specified path.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_CreateDirectory_Description
data.value: Create a new directory at the specified path.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_WriteToFile_Description
data.value: Write content to a text file at the specified path.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_ReplaceFileContent_Description
data.value: Replace content in a text file.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_ReadFile_FileTooLarge_ErrorMessage
data.value: File size exceeds 10 MB; read operation is not supported.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_DeleteFiles_SystemFile_Deletion_ErrorMessage
data.value: Cannot delete system files or directories.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_WriteToFile_BinaryFile_Write_ErrorMessage
data.value: Cannot write to a binary file.

data.name: HandledFunctionInvokingException_ArgumentError
data.value: The model provided an invalid value for the parameter '{0}', likely due to hallucination.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_ReplaceFileContent_FileTooLarge_ErrorMessage
data.value: File size is larger than 10 MB, replace operation is not supported.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_ReplaceFileContent_BinaryFile_ErrorMessage
data.value: Cannot replace content in a binary file.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_EnsureDirectoryInfo_PathIsFile_ErrorMessage
data.value: Specified path is a file, not a directory.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_EnsureDirectoryInfo_PathNotExist_ErrorMessage
data.value: Specified path is not a valid file or directory.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_EnsureFileInfo_PathIsDirectory_ErrorMessage
data.value: Specified path is a directory, not a file.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_FileSystem_EnsureFileInfo_PathNotExist_ErrorMessage
data.value: Specified file or directory was not found.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_VisualTree_CaptureVisualElementById_Description
data.value: Capture a screenshot of a visual element.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_VisualTree_CaptureFullScreen_Description
data.value: Capture a screenshot of the entire screen.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_VisualTree_ExecuteVisualActionQueue_Description
data.value: Execute a set of UI automation actions such as clicking, typing, or sending shortcuts.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_VisualTree_CaptureFullScreen_NoScreenAvailable_ErrorMessage
data.value: No screen is available to capture.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_WebSnapshot_Description
data.value: Capture a snapshot of a web page‚Äôs content and basic info.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_NoWebSearchEngineProviderSelected_ErrorMessage
data.value: Web search engine provider is not selected. Please configure it in the web browser of plugin settings.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_InvalidWebSearchEngineEndpoint_ErrorMessage
data.value: Provided endpoint is invalid; please ensure it is a valid absolute URI.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_GoogleSearchEngineIdNotSet_ErrorMessage
data.value: Google Search Engine ID is not set. Please configure it in the plugin settings.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_UnsupportedWebSearchEngineProvider_ErrorMessage
data.value: Web search engine provider is not supported. Please switch it in the plugin settings.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_WebSearchEngineApiKeyNotSet_ErrorMessage
data.value: API key is not set. Please configure it in the plugin settings.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_PuppeteerBrowserDownloadConnectionError_ErrorMessage
data.value: Failed to connect to the Puppeteer browser download URL.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_WebBrowser_PuppeteerBrowserLaunchError_ErrorMessage
data.value: Failed to launch the Puppeteer browser.

data.name: ScreenSelectionToolTip_TipText_Normal
data.value: Left click to select, Right click or Esc to cancel Scroll wheel or number keys to switch pick modes

data.name: CustomAssistant_RequestTimeoutSeconds_Description
data.value: Set the wait time for the model to return results, measured in seconds. For slower models (such as thinking models and local models), consider extending this time appropriately.

data.name: Windows_BuiltInChatPlugin_PowerShell_ExecuteScript_DenyMessage
data.value: User denied consent for PowerShell script execution.

data.name: DynamicWebProxy_CreateProxy_EndpointSchemeUnsupported_ErrorMessage
data.value: Proxy server scheme '{0}' is not supported.

data.name: ChatFileAttachment_Create_FileTooLarge
data.value: File size ({0}) exceeds the maximum allowed size ({1}).

data.name: CommonSettings_FontSize_Description
data.value: Adjust the global font display size.

data.name: McpTransportConfiguration_Name_ValidationErrorMessage_Regex
data.value: Only numbers, letters, and the characters ‚Äú-‚Äù, ‚Äú_‚Äù are permitted.

data.name: ValidationErrorMessage_MaxLength
data.value: The length must not exceed {0} characters.

data.name: ChatPluginConsentRequest_MCP_Header
data.value: ‚Äú{0}‚Äù is an MCP tool. Everywhere cannot verify its required permissions. Please ensure it comes from a trusted source, and Everywhere assumes no responsibility for its consequences.

data.name: ValidationErrorMessage_NullKey
data.value: The item key cannot be empty.

data.name: ValidationErrorMessage_NullValue
data.value: The item value cannot be empty.

data.name: HandledFunctionInvokingException_FunctionNotFound
data.value: The model attempted to invoke the non-existent tool '{0}', likely due to hallucination.

data.name: McpTransportConfigurationForm_DescriptionTextBox_Label
data.value: Description (For display and differentiation purposes only)

data.name: ChatPluginPageViewModel_EditMcpPlugin_DialogTitle
data.value: Edit MCP Plugin (Fields marked with * are required)

data.name: ChatPluginPageViewModel_AddMcpPlugin_DialogTitle
data.value: Add MCP Plugin (Fields marked with * are required)

data.name: ChatPluginPageViewModel_RemoveMcpPlugin_ConfirmationMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove ‚Äú{0}‚Äù?

data.name: DebugFeaturesControl_CreateDumpToast_Content
data.value: Please wait while the dump is being created. Everywhere will be unresponsive during this time.

data.name: MacOS_PermissionHelper_PleaseGrantAccessibilityPermission
data.value: Please grant Accessibility permissions to the application in System Settings > Privacy & Security > Accessibility, and restart the application.

data.name: Entrance_EverywhereAlreadyRunning
data.value: Everywhere is already running. Please check your system tray for the application window.

data.name: HandledFunctionInvokingException_ArgumentMissing
data.value: The required parameter '{0}' is missing from the tool invocation, likely due to hallucination.

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_System_Description
data.value: Control macOS system applications and perform system tasks.

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_System_ManageReminders_DenyMessage
data.value: You denied the request to manage reminders.

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_System_ManageCalendar_DenyMessage
data.value: You denied the request to manage calendar.

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_System_ManageNotes_DenyMessage
data.value: You denied the request to manage notes.

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_System_SendEmail_DenyMessage
data.value: You denied the request to send an email.

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_System_ExecuteScript_DenyMessage
data.value: You denied the request to execute AppleScript.

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_Zsh_Description
data.value: Provides the ability to execute zsh scripts, allowing direct interaction with the system. However, it is also dangerous and may result in accidental file deletion or system crashes.

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_Zsh_ExecuteScript_ScriptConsent_Header
data.value: The following zsh script will be executed

data.name: MacOS_BuiltInChatPlugin_Zsh_ExecuteScript_DenyMessage
data.value: User denied consent for zsh script execution.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_Essential_RunSubagent_Description
data.value: Allowing the assistant to assign a brand-new assistant to execute subtasks helps conserve context within individual models while better handling complex tasks.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_Essential_ManageTodoList_Description
data.value: Allowing the assistant to maintain a concise to-do list, which proves highly useful when handling complex tasks. Note that this list is temporary and will disappear upon switching conversations or exiting Everywhere.

data.name: BuiltInChatPlugin_Essential_Description
data.value: Providing a suite of essential capabilities that empower the assistant to better handle complex tasks.

data.name: ManageApiKeyForm_DeleteApiKeys_Dialog_Message
data.value: Are you sure to delete {0} API key(s)? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: ManageApiKeyForm_DeleteApiKey_Flyout_Content
data.value: Are you sure to delete? This action cannot be undone.

data.name: ModelProviderConfiguratorSelector_AdvancedConfiguratorModel_Description
data.value: Freely configure all model parameters, compatible with third-party models.

data.name: ModelProviderConfiguratorSelector_PresetBasedConfiguratorModel_Description
data.value: Select common models from presets and get started quickly.

data.name: WelcomeView_AssistantStep_Advanced_Message1
data.value: Welcome to advanced mode. You can configure third-party models supported by the API protocol.

data.name: WelcomeView_AssistantStep_Advanced_Message2
data.value: Please note that I cannot guarantee perfect compatibility with all third-party models.

data.name: AdvancedModelProviderConfigurator_InvalidEndpoint
data.value: Must be a valid URL starting with http:// or https://

data.name: ChatWindowSettings_AlwaysStartNewChat_Description
data.value: Automatically start a fresh session when summoning the app via shortcut, bypassing the previous conversation.

data.name: McpImportForm_Description
data.value: Paste your MCP configuration JSON below, or import it from a local file.

data.name: Linux_NativeHelper_RestartAsAdministrator_DesktopNotification
data.value: Administrator privileges are usually unnecessary on Linux. If needed, please re-exec with sudo.

data.name: Linux_ShortcutListener_Register_FailedToGrabHotkey
